command: #!/usr/bin/env bash [[ -f "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/bash_init.sh" ]] && . "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/bash_init.sh" # index created using: curl -s 'http://devguru.com/technologies/javascript/index.asp'|grep -o '[a-z][a-zA-Z]*'|perl -pe 's/([^<]*)<\/a>/$2\t$1/'|sort|uniq|gzip >dev_guru_index.gz ref=$(zgrep -w "^${TM_SELECTED_TEXT:-$TM_CURRENT_WORD}" "$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT/dev_guru_index.gz"|cut -f2) [[ -n "$ref" ]] && exit_show_html "" echo "No documentation found."
name: Documentation for Word / Selection
